metadata.title: CVE-2024-27065 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: do not compare internal table flags on updatesRestore skipping transaction if table update does not modify flags.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
